# SingleStoreGeography constructor

Constructs a [`SingleStoreGeography`](../SingleStoreGeography.md) from Well-known Text (WKT) bytes.

```csharp
public SingleStoreGeography(string wkt)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| wkt | The Well-known Text serialization of the geography. |

## Return Value

A new [`SingleStoreGeography`](../SingleStoreGeography.md) containing the specified geography.
